data.title: CITS: Boss Talks
data.meta_description: Planned and past episodes for the Montgomery County Fire & Rescue Digital Media Production Team produced CITS: Boss Talks.
data.text:
Episode 2: 2nd Alarm Fire at the Enclave Apartments

Air Date

June 26, 2024

Moderator

Captain Matthew Machala

Presenters

Captain Chris Reilly

Captain James Snyder

Lieutenant Joseph King

Lieutenant Eric Smolinsky

Description

We will discuss the fire event that took place at the Enclave in co.12's area. Come hear the challenges that the initial companies (12 and 16) faced as they overcame out of service elevators, lots of residents, and a fire on the 19th floor. This will be a great opportunity to discuss high-rise operations and the challenges we face here at MCFRS.

Episode 1: Old Hundred Road Woods Fire

Air Date

May 30, 2024

Moderators

Battalion Chief Russel Blinkhorn

Lt. Richard Grierson

Presenters

Assistant Chief John Dimitriadis

Battalion Chief Christopher Stroup

Captain Brett Livingston

Captain Michael Green

Description

Our next hybrid episode of Boss Talk and From the Command Post will be featuring the incident that took on Old Hundred Road. The incident was a large brush/woods fire. During this episode, Unit Officers and Command Staff will discuss the decision-making process and actions that assisted them in battling this large, fast-moving woods fire. Events of this nature are few and far between in Montgomery County, so hear from the folks who were there doing the work.

Episode 3: High Rise Building Fire with Lithium-Ion Battery

Air Date

October 23, 2023

Moderators

Captain Brady Miller

Captain Matthew Machala

Presenters

Captain Bryan Riley

Captain Robert Faas

Description

Hear about the actions taken at a recent apartment fire in Bethesda where a number of lithium-ion batteries were involved. The discussion begins with fire attack operations and moves to containment and clean-up operations. This was one of MCFRS' first, real structure fires where multiple lithium-ion batteries were involved in fire spread inside an occupied building.

Episode 2: Whetstone Drive House Fire w/ Entrapment

Air Date

August 24, 2023

Moderator

Battalion Chief Russel Blinkhorn

Presenters

Battalion Chief Ivan Browning

Lieutenant Ed Klahr

Episode 1: Quince Orchard Blvd Building Explosion

Moderator
